text: i think high incidence of particular variant somehow indicates high infection rate. also, they can perhaps sequence and check what part in the sequence mutated and possible effect in the phenotype. of course i’m just brainstorming what likely should be the steps to characterize each variant in terms of infection efficacy or even death efficacy.

text:
>  i think high incidence of particular variant somehow indicates high infection rate.
Isn’t that the fallacy from not applying Bayes theory correctly?
